text: My favorite theme from this game, gotta love the retro Genesis sound. Apart from that, I'll just keep focusing on the much better game that came out just before in Sonic Mania.

text: After playing the game, I thought I appreciated the soundtrack a bit more than I originally thought I would. The game itself was okay. The levels were fun but too short.

text: Sonic Forces being short may be the best plus of that game. I rather have short shitty game than long shitty game.
author: Bartosz Skorupa

text: Bartosz Skorupa I really didn’t think the game was that terrible. My problem was the level length, not really the game length. I actually think that the game would’ve been a lot better had the levels been a better length.
author: GenericYoutubeComment Channel

text: This song is a fucking jam.
author: EricKirby1

text: game received so much hate, but i fucking LOVED it! Sonic Mania was also great but i honestly really still liked Sonic Forces. Felt like a Sonic Generations 2, with create-a-character. graphics were mindblowing on PC and music was pretty damn great! Not the best 3D sonic but not as bad as ppl make it out to be imo
author: Loose Goose

text:
The graphics were indeed mindblowing, and I almost completely agree with you.
The game wasn't horrible, but for the many rings within the game, they could've been a shop for more customisation items for your character.
This music right here slaps, but the others are always missing something... somehow...
author: ikec4937

text: Sonic Force's soundtrack certainly wasn't memorable compared to previous entries (a tragedy in itself), but there were definitely some standout songs like this one and all three parts of the final boss music. :D
